SkillDesc: 25% chance to drop 1 random Signal Orb after an enemy is taken down
50% chance to drop 1 random Signal Orb after an enemy is taken down
50% chance to drop 2 random Signal Orbs after an enemy is taken down
50% chance to drop 1 random set of Signal Orbs after an enemy is taken down
Upon damaging the enemy with Basic Attacks, Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10% for 10s, stacking up to 100%.
Upon damaging the enemy with Basic Attacks, Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20% for 10s, stacking up to 150%.
Upon damaging the enemy with Basic Attacks, Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 25% for 10s, stacking up to 200%.
Upon damaging the enemy with Basic Attacks, Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 50% for 10s, stacking up to 300%.
Basic Attacks generate an extra 1 Signature Energy.
Basic Attacks generate an extra 2 Signature Energy.
Pinging orbs and Basic Attacks generate an extra 2 Signature Energy.
Pinging orbs and Basic Attacks generate an extra 3 Signature Energy. Casting Signature will return 10% Signature Energy.
3-Ping DMG increases by 15%
3-Ping DMG increases by 30%.
1-Ping and 2-Ping are regarded as 3-Ping. 3-Ping DMG increases by 30%
1-Ping and 2-Ping are regarded as 3-Ping. 3-Ping DMG increases by 50%.
Making 3 3-Pings in a row will trigger Matrix. 10s cooldown.
Making 3 3-Pings in a row will trigger Matrix. 8s cooldown.
Making 2 3-Pings in a row will trigger Matrix. 8s cooldown.
Making 2 3-Pings in a row will trigger Matrix. 6s cooldown.
Triggering a 3-Ping will heal the player for 5% of the 3-Ping's DMG.
Triggering a 3-Ping will heal the player for 5% of the 3-Ping's DMG. The excess healing will be converted into a shield.
Triggering a 3-Ping will heal the player for 8% of the 3-Ping's DMG. The excess healing will be converted into a shield that grants the player Super Armor while the shield is active.
Triggering a 3-Ping will heal the player for 10% of the 3-Ping's DMG. The excess healing will be converted into a shield that grants the player Super Armor while the shield is active.
Enemies have a 50% chance to self-destruct upon being taken down, dealing DMG equal to 15% of max HP to nearby enemies.
Enemies have a 70% chance to self-destruct upon being taken down, dealing DMG equal to 20% of max HP to nearby enemies.
Enemies self-destruct upon being taken down, dealing DMG equal to 25% of max HP to nearby enemies.
Enemies self-destruct upon being taken down, dealing DMG equal to 35% of max HP to nearby enemies.
Enemies have a 40% chance to grant you 25% DMG Bonus for 5s upon being taken down. Earning this bonus again will extend its duration.
Enemies have a 40% chance to grant you 50% DMG Bonus for 5s upon being taken down. Earning this bonus again will extend its duration.
Enemies have a 50% chance to grant you 80% DMG Bonus for 5s upon being taken down. Earning this bonus again will extend its duration.
Enemies have a 60% chance to grant you 100% DMG Bonus for 5s upon being taken down. Earning this bonus again will extend its duration.
Enemies have their HP reduced by 10% permanently.
Enemies have their HP reduced by 20% permanently.
Enemies have their HP reduced by 30% permanently, and have all their Resistances reduced by 15%.
Enemies have their HP reduced by 40% permanently, and have all their Resistances reduced by 40%.
Upon damaging an enemy, there is a 10% chance to deal Extra DMG to this target equal to 75% of the DMG dealt. This chance increases with your points, up to 30% at 12000 points.
Upon damaging an enemy, there is a 15% chance to deal Extra DMG to this target equal to 100% of the DMG dealt. This chance increases with your points, up to 35% at 12000 points.
Upon damaging an enemy, there is a 20% chance to deal Extra DMG to this target equal to 150% of the DMG dealt. This chance increases with your points, up to 40% at 12000 points.
Upon damaging an enemy, there is a 25% chance to deal Extra DMG to this target equal to 180% of the DMG dealt. This chance increases with your points, up to 50% at 12000 points.
Earn 1.2x points when current points exceed 15000.
Earn 1.3x points when current points exceed 12000.
Earn 1.4x points when current points exceed 10000.
Earn 1.6x points when current points exceed 10000.
Enemies will not have any affixes within the first 10s of the battle.
Enemies will not have any affixes within the first 15s of the battle.
Enemies will not have any affixes within the first 20s of the battle. In addition, remove all affixes from the enemies when you have more than 35000 points.
Enemies will not have any affixes within the first 25s of the battle. In addition, remove all affixes from the enemies when you have more than 30000 points.
